short-title: Scholarship Grants To Public School Teachers Act
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00121
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING SCHOLARSHIP GRANTS TO PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS
SHORT TITLE : Scholarship Grants To Public School Teachers Act
ABSTRACT : Hopes to help in the nationwide effort to attract and retain exceptional and dedicated teachers who will nurture our young Filipinos to become productive partners in nation-building.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
